column3: str

Maru has a crease of consternation upon his noble brow.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Search for the nervous Rider.
Report back to Maru.
One of our new recruits has been takin' his sweet time with his delivery...
He ain't irresponsible, just...not the best conversationalist. You think you could check in on him an' make sure he's alright?
He's probably loiterin' nervously around the Great Work somewhere. Give him a nudge in the right direction if he ain't makin' progress.
B-By the Sisters! This man just snuck up on me and started shouting! What does he want? I'm terrified to ask!
This man has been standing here, squirming in silence for some time. Is he in distress?
Er! Erm! ...Aaah!
S-Stop shouting at me! Just tell me what you want and leave me be!
N-No, I didn't mean─! Th-The boss always says to s-speak up, so I just─! Er!
What will you say?
Pause. Now take a deep breath.
You must speak confidently, man! From your diaphragm!
Eye contact is key. Steady, unblinking eye contact...
Y-You got it!
After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.
D-Deep breaths? O-Okay... That... Oh, that feels better... Whooo...
I think I can take it from here, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>mister</If>! Thanks for your help─an' tell Maru that I'll be back soon!
Er... Errrrrr...
He appears to be in deep thought, but I'm not certain why he wishes I bear witness to it...
I-I knew what I was gonna say... But now I can't remember nothin'... Er...
What will you say?
Have you a written list of your objectives?
Remember, man! Remember with sheer willpower!
Just start talking until you figure it out.
Y-You got it!
After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.
Oh, th-that's right! I wrote it down, didn't I? 'Cause I knew somethin' like this might happen! Ha! I got so nervous, I even forgot that I remembered that I'd forget!
Thanks, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>mister</If>─I think I'll be alright! Tell Maru that I'll be back soon.
I remember their name... But what did they look like again...? Oh no...
What will you say?
I'm sure Nidhana could point you in the right direction.
Just introduce yourself to everybody here. You're bound to remember at some point!
Start screaming their name. I'm sure <Emphasis>someone</Emphasis> will come running.
I-If I could do that, I would've done it already!
The nervous Rider's shoulders slump dejectedly. Try advising him again.
O-Oh! I was so focused on tryin' to fix it myself, I never considered askin' for help!
Thanks, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>mister</If>! I can take it from here. Tell Maru not to worry no more!
So that's what he was up to... Thanks for steerin' him true.
His nerves can really get the better of him, but he's been downright stubborn about helpin' out with deliveries.
We'll keep him runnin' errands closer to home, but I hope you won't be averse to helpin' him out again, should he need it. I know it'd mean the world to him...
